Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) P.question: Does your company have an Extended Producer Responsibility plan in place? – If yes, please describe the collection system, processing practices, and measures taken to ensure compliance.

Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) Details.question: Have you conducted a Life Cycle Assessment for any of your major products or services?   – Please specify the assessment boundary (cradle-to-grave, cradle-to-gate, etc.), key environmental impacts identified, and improvement actions.

Environmental Impact Assessment.question: Has your company carried out an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) for your operations?   – Describe the methodology used, key findings, and any mitigation or adaptation measures implemented.

Waste Management Practices.question: What are your detailed waste management practices?   – Provide data on total waste generated, breakdown by disposal method (landfill, incineration, recycling, composting), and any related emission factors.

Impact on Biodiversity.question: Do your operations have any impact on biodiversity?  – If yes, detail the locations and extent of impact (e.g., habitat alteration, species affected), and outline any conservation or restoration initiatives.

PAT Scheme Performance.question: Are any of your facilities designated under the Government’s Perform, Achieve and Trade (PAT) scheme?  – If yes, please provide information on targets, improvements in energy efficiency, and performance outcomes.

Reclaimed Products & Packaging.question: What proportion of your products (and/or packaging materials) are reclaimed (reused, recycled, or disposed of safely) relative to total products sold?   – Describe the process and calculation methodology.
